statements: SELECT * FROM StudentContactInformation;
SELECT student_name, email_address FROM StudentContactInformation WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM StudentContactInformation WHERE contact_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM StudentContactInformation ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT student_name, address FROM StudentContactInformation WHERE address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT student_name, email_address, address FROM StudentContactInformation WHERE student_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM StudentContactInformation WHERE email_address LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT student_name, contact_number FROM StudentContactInformation WHERE address LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT student_name, contact_number FROM StudentContactInformation ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM StudentContactInformation WHERE address LIKE '%California%' AND contact_number LIKE '%555%' LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM student_contact_info ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM student_contact_info WHERE student_id = 3;
SELECT course_name, instructor, course_date FROM course_registration_details WHERE course_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY course_date ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM student_contact_info WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM course_registration_details WHERE instructor = 'John Doe';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM student_contact_info WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, course_date, instructor FROM course_registration_details WHERE student_id = 2;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM student_contact_info WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT course_name, course_date, instructor FROM course_registration_details WHERE course_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM student_contact_info ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, student_email, phone_number FROM students;
SELECT course_name, start_date FROM courses ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM students, courses WHERE students.student_id = 1 AND courses.course_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, course_name, registration_date FROM students JOIN registrations ON students.student_id = registrations.student_id JOIN courses ON registrations.course_id = courses.course_id;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students WHERE student_id > 1 ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT course_name, start_date, instructor FROM courses WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT student_name, course_name, registration_date FROM students JOIN registrations ON students.student_id = registrations.student_id JOIN courses ON registrations.course_id = courses.course_id;

SELECT student_name, course_name, registration_date FROM students JOIN registrations ON students.student_id = registrations.student_id JOIN courses ON registrations.course_id = courses.course_id WHERE registration_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM courses ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT student_id, course_id, enrollment_date FROM enrollments WHERE student_id = 3 AND course_id = 2;
SELECT contact_type, contact_info FROM contacts WHERE student_id = 4;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, instructor, course_description FROM courses WHERE course_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT student_id, email FROM students WHERE first_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT course_name, COUNT(*) as total_students FROM courses LEFT JOIN enrollments ON courses.course_id = enrollments.course_id GROUP BY course_name;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, instructor, start_date, end_date FROM Courses WHERE course_id = 2;
SELECT first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM Students ORDER BY last_name, first_name DESC;
SELECT student_id, course_id, payment_date, amount FROM Payments WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Students ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT course_name, start_date, end_date FROM Courses WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT Students.first_name, Students.last_name, Addresses.city FROM Students JOIN Addresses ON Students.student_id = Addresses.student_id;

SELECT Courses.course_name, COUNT(Enrollments.student_id) AS num_students FROM Courses LEFT JOIN Enrollments ON Courses.course_id = Enrollments.course_id GROUP BY Courses.course_id ORDER BY num_students DESC;
